sense.def:
A storm
je zelo slabo vreme z obilnim dežjem, močnim vetrom in pogosto tudi z grmenjem in bliskanjem.

seg.quote: Wait until the storm passes over.

sense.def:
A storm
je tudi jezen ali vznemirjen odziv večjega števila oseb.

seg.quote: The decision provoked a storm of criticism from Conservative MPs.

sense.def:
To storm into or out of a place
pomeni hitro in hrupno vstopiti ali oditi z nekega kraja, ker smo jezni.

seg.quote: I stormed into the room in a rage.

sense.def:
To storm
pomeni zelo glasno in jezno nekaj reči;

seg.quote: No matter how I pleaded or stormed, I could never make her understand.

sense.def:
Kadar ljudje
storm a place
, neki kraj napadejo.

seg.quote: The infantry stormed through the walls of the Imperial Palace.
